column4: What can i do to enable hidden devices in proprietary drivers? my video card isnt there, or is there a way to see the video driver im currently using?
what card?
8800 gts
what version of ubuntu?
8.04 also my reltrek sound sint working
8.04 might be too old for that card.  Did you check if nvidia-glx-new supports it?
read the package description to check.  Did the Alternate install cd also fail?
yes it failed aswell, i have a sata drive, is there a way to upgrade thru ubuntu already...
yes, you can upgrade.  How did the install fail exactly?
at first it all seemed fine on normal and alternitve and when it went to reboot it would drop to a shell as soon as the normal login screen would have came up
so you could login normally then?
could you log in with the text login you got?
it would just drop to shell
busybox?
yes
my card is supported under that package, how would i install it? also, how would i configure my audio device
or do you think attemping to upgeade woule be a better idea
sudo apt-get install nvidia-glx-new, or use synaptic like any other package
up to you
im trying the upgrade to see if my devices will be native
ok
